name: AerialSpace
description:
Aerial Space

Space-Shooter was created during my 1st Year in Computer Science for Games at Brighton University. This game was an assignment using C++ and the SDL2 Library.

1. Running The Game:

  • Extract the .ZIP Folder.
  • Navigate inside the Folder.
  • Run AerialSpace.exe
    • What To Do If Windows Blocks It?
      • Select "More Info.." and then "Run Anyway". 
      • This is just because the executable has not been verified due to it being self-made.

2. Features:

  • Enemies drop Extra Health and Extra Score on Death.
  • Movement is only on the vertical axis.
  • Three Difficulty Levels.
  • Cheats have been included.

3. Difficulties

  • Easy
    • Your Damage: 100
    • Your Health: 100
    • Enemy Damage: 25
    • Final Boss Health: 1000
  • Medium
    • Your Damage: 50
    • Your Health: 75
    • Enemy Damage: 50
    • Final Boss Health: 1250
  • Hard
    • Your Damage: 25
    • Your Health: 60
    • Enemy Damage: 60
    • Final Boss Health: 1500

4. Controls:

  • W: Up.
  • S: Down.
  • Space: Shoot.
  • Left Arrow: Previous Level | Cheat.
  • Right Arrow: Next Level | Cheat.
